Articles.Content: Just logged in to download the 1.0.1 patch, and it's offering me 1.0.2, or is that just a difference between Steam and the Kerbal store?

No its an actual new patch.

Downloaded 1.0.1 and few minutes later 1.0.2. So it seems to be a hotfix for the hotfix or something like that.

Release notes [Here](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/content/338-KSP-1-0-2-is-Up!)

Thermal:

\* Fixed ships potentially overheating when splashed down.

Parts

\* Small tweak to Mk16 parachute drag.
